players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I investigated Alice last night and discovered she is the mafioso. We need to vote her out to win."
You: "That is a lie. I am the detective and I investigated Charlie last night. He is the mafioso."
Bob: "I don't know who to believe. Charlie, can you explain why you think Alice is mafia?"
Charlie: "Alice is lying. There's only one detective, and it's me. I investigated her and she's the mafioso. Bob, trust my evidence—we must vote her out."
You: "Charlie is lying to save himself. I'm the real detective and he's mafioso. Bob, vote Charlie with me to win."
